plot: Day 61 is the story of Jackie, a woman struggling with the triple identity of mother, artist and addict. Sixty days sober, she shows up unannounced at her daughter's eighth birthday party ...
title: Day 61
plot_es: Day 61 is the story of Jackie, a woman struggling with the triple identity of mother, artist and addict. Sixty days sober, she shows up unannounced at her daughter's eighth birthday party ...
plot_en: Day 61 is the story of Jackie, a woman struggling with the triple identity of mother, artist and addict. Sixty days sober, she shows up unannounced at her daughter's eighth birthday party ...
